trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for selecting and editing a connection string property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 提供可在设计时选择和编辑 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 对象的连接字符串属性的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor> class is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> object that can be used at design time to select and edit a connection string expression and to assign the expression to a control property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor>类是<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>以选择并编辑连接字符串表达式，并将该表达式分配到的控件属性可在设计时使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor> class at design time to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>对象使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor>类在设计时设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface is available, connection strings are retrieved from the data services of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>接口可用，将从可视化设计器的数据服务中检索连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface is not available, a modal dialog box is shown to allow editing of the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>接口不可用，显示为模式对话框，以允许编辑的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor> with a property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>特性将相关联<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor>具有属性。

trans-unit.source: When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 设计器宿主关联的属性在设计图面上编辑，当调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method displays a user interface for building the connection string expression and returns the connection string that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>方法会显示用于生成连接字符串表达式的用户界面并返回由用户选择的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method indicates the display style of the user interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>方法指示的用户界面的显示样式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> that the connection string applies to.
Returns the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" />, if the <paramref name="instance" /> is not <see langword="null" />; otherwise, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="instance" /> 不为 <see langword="null" />，则为 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 属性；否则为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> that the connection string applies to.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 属性。
